original_title: メイキング・オブ・ガメラ～大怪獣空中決戦
overview: The production of Gamera: Guardian of the Universe. Includes interviews with director Shusuke Kaneko, screenwriter Kazunori Ito and lead actress Ayako Fujitani.  Also includes behind the scenes footage from special effects director Shinji Higuchi and interviews with suit actors Jun Suzuki and Yumi Kameyama.
title: The Making of Gamera: Guardian of the Universe
